document.text: The bride is a graduate of Nelson County High School and is employed by Courtland Manufacturing Company. The groom is a graduate of Appomattox County High School and is employed by Virginia Fibre Corporation. The couple will reside in Appomattox. Judy Wright

document.text: Courtland Manufacturing Company this week announced C lans for a training program to e set up in the Sangil Plant. A training unit director will train eight to ten girls in a time period of from four days to two and one-half weeks, depending on the type of operation.

COURTLAND OFFICE BUILDING, lo cated Yn the site where Uhe pld S. L. Ferguson homeplace stood for many years, just across Court Street opposite the Court House Square, takes on shape as construction of the building moves along. Clover fUll Manufacturing Company is contractor for tne 128 X 32 square foot office building- At the present time, workers are ready , to begin brick laying, they have partially completed the mechanical rough-in work.
